Literature.Title: Engineering increased stability in the antimicrobial peptide pediocin PA-1.
Literature.Author: Johnsen L, Fimland G, Eijsink V, Nissen-Meyer J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Latilactobacillus sakei NCDO 2714(MIC=0.020µM),Loigolactobacillus coryniformis subsp. torquens NCDO 2740(MIC=0.010µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCDO 581(MIC=0.030µM),Carnobacterium maltaromaticum UI49(MIC=0.060µM)
